Laws, Regulations and Policy

Use the website links to discover the answers to these questions:

 

1.        Which Government Department is responsible for the TDG Regulations?
 

2.        How long is a “CCO Carrier (Driver) of .22 Calibre Ammunition”   certification good for?
 

3.        Is there a policy that allows the transportation of DND ammunition on commercial aircraft?
 

4.        How long can you be sent to jail for if you are found guilty of careless storage of ammunition under Section 86 (1) of the Criminal Code of Canada?

1.        Transport Canada
 

2.        Three years (TD 569 Annex A)
 

3.        CATO 14-41 Annex B, Appendix 2
 

4.        Up to two years for the first offence link
